page.title: 08PARKHAM
page.content: Starting at the Hall car park turn left into the road. On the left is the School and opposite are four council houses.When you reach the crossroads tern right.The village pub,"The Bell Inn"is on your left.Just over 110 metres past the Inn is a road to the left called barton close.Opposite barton close is a new bungalow and the old rectory. further down the hill is a new rectory and on the corner at the bottom is a hotel called penhaven. The road tern s to the left and eventually meet another road at a"T" junction.a walk of about 200m will take you to the village green. On your right is the village post office and the doctor's surgery. On the left is the home of Mr. and Mrs. Pickard who deliver the milk. {....cont on page 9
